titleStmt.title: The novels of Elizabeth, Queen of England containing the history of Queen Ann of Bullen / faithfully rendered into English by S.H.
titleStmt.author: Aulnoy, Madame d' (Marie-Catherine), 1650 or 51-1705.
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.
Hickman, Spencer.

notesStmt.note: Part 2 has title: The novels of Elizabeth, Queen of England, containing the history of Bassa Solyman and the Princess Eronima : the last part / Englished by S. Hickman. London : Printed by E.T. and R.H. for Mark Pardoe, 1681.
Attributed to the Comtesse d' Aulnoy. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in British Library.
